node.name: Kids Play Zone Tent MAKE: WEBBY
node.description: Attractive playground that doesn’t have any metal to avoid the accident for small babies. With hexagonal perimeter the net carpet area is enough for babies up to age 2 years. Height of boundary made with net is enough to avoid the jump of babies. More than 50 soft plastic balls are provided along with play zone to attract the babies. (FOR: 0-2 year / SIZE: 760x760x540mm / WEIGHT: 1 Kg)
node.content: Reviewing many moms online we came to know that babies prefer those places which are attractive and provide comforts like the mother's touch / Hexagonal edges and carpet area of 7 Sqfeet provide enough space for 2 babies to play safely / Boundaries are made with soft net and height is approximately 1 foot which can hold the weight of 1-year-old baby / Bottom covering is made with washable fabric which is easy to maintain / More than 50 colorful balls are enough to make baby busy with their own playing / No metal framework is used to avoiding any kind of accident like a cut or wound / Basketball slot and efficient packing bag on which both balls and tent can be arranged / Make babies busy so that mother can do their other household chores.
node.alt: Webby Kids Play Zone Tent with 50 Balls

node.name: Baby Bather MAKE: MEE MEE
node.description: Adjustable backrest for the initial month of babies and strong anti-skid base ensures bather is stable at all times. Cushioned edges of the seat base is of thick plastic and soft mesh can be hand-washed or machine-washed in gentle cycle in warm water. Premium product for baby’s hygiene job with material of zero toxicity. (FOR: 0-2 year / CARRY WEIGHT: 15 Kg / MATERIAL: Modified Plastic)
node.content: An Indian origin product for baby wash, made with modified PET plastic which is highly durable, internationally recognized and zero toxic / With metal frame base it can hold the maximum weight of 15 Kg, also adjustable backrest provide support for small babies / Hard surface like ground, resist more to soft skin of babies at time of bathing that’s why cushion is provided at edges and seat base for better comfort / Soft mesh is wrapped over thick plastic to make it like breathable cushion, also pillow is designed with same technology to support the head of babies while bathing / Modified PET plastic is resistive against chemical effects like soap & shampoo used during bathing / Trending product for 0-2 year old babies.
node.alt: Mee Mee Baby Bather Anti Skid CompactPink

node.name: Folding Swing Cradle MAKE: A TO Z HUB
node.description: Easy to assemble or disassemble, folds into a carry bag of 4 feet and carry along to any place even on airplane. Lightweight aluminium and heavy-duty hammock spring can hold the weight of 3-year-old baby. Avoid flat head syndrome, improve digestion also helps in quick sleep initiation for babies. (FOR: 0-3 year / CARRY WEIGHT: 20 Kg / MATERIAL: Stainless Steel & Cloth)
node.content: Truly Indian product with the structure of foldable frame made with stainless steel and breathable cloth that can carry a maximum weight of 20 Kg / Net 3 minutes taken to assemble the structure while cradle cloth is made with breathable fabric, size of 3 feet / Reviewed by many moms regarding the flat head syndrome on which they suggested that avoid the hard surface and maybe that’s why cradle like this is a good option for early days / Also it improves digestion of premature baby due to its alignment which is safe against colic(severe pain in the abdomen caused by wind or obstruction in the intestines, suffered especially by babies) / Pilot project is first tested on Gujrat and after the success rate of 8 out of 10, the product is launched in the market / Tested and suggested for babies up to the age of 0-3 years.
node.alt: A TO Z HUB Baby Boys and Girls Portable Folding Swing Cradle Silver

node.name: Baby Care Kit MAKE: MAMAEARTH
node.description: Extract of nature directly preserved through traditional process, hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive skin. Clinically tested in Europe, filled with sufficient quantity which can last for 2 months. Did not contain any harmful chemical and safe against baby skin licking. (FOR: 0-1 year child / QUANTITY: 6 Nos)
node.content: One of the natural product for baby skin nourishment with no chemical use as per the European organic test scale / Extract of aloe leaf, coconut, olive are used as a base product while sorbitan palmitate extract is used for stabilizer oil / This baby kit consist shampoo, body wash, sunscreen and massage oil which are enough to care the delicate skin from any exposed environment / This sunscreen maintain the natural colour of skin and with other chemical products it is found colour of babies skin get darker / Emulsion gel technology of mix which generally used in honey manufacturing, in less quantity spread more / Shampoo & body wash is safe to use against eye and massage oil is effective against mosquito or home flies / Recommended product as per existing users and growing customer list day by day.
node.alt: Mamaearth Complete Baby Care Kit Combo White

node.name: StarShine Stroller MAKE: LUVLAP
node.description: Reverse handlebar mechanism enables the two-way pushing, from back and from front as well. Adjustable 3 positions seat recline mechanism, upright, inclined and flat depending on the baby's mood. 360-degree mobility on front wheel with swivel lock and spacious storage basket at bottom. (FOR: 0-3 year / CARRY WEIGHT: 20 Kg / MATERIAL: Steel & EVA sheet)
node.content: Made in China product having features like window at canopy to keep a watch on baby while strolling / Intelligent design of reversible handlebar for easy maneuver from back and front side / Although wheel can swivel 360 degree, but on uneven surfaces swivel feature can be locked for better stability / Rear wheel brakes can be easily operated by foot and ensures that stroller does not move when don't want it to / Canopy made with EVA polymer that do not absorb heat and protects child from harsh sunlight & strong winds / Soft cushioned seat provides maximum comfort to baby and spacious storage basket in bottom carry changeable stuff of baby / Light weight product for new moms so that they can carry their child to park for fresh air.
node.alt: LuvLap Starshine StrollerPram Easy Fold for Newborn BabyKids 03 Years Black

node.name: Baby Care Collection MAKE: HIMALAYA
node.description: Only fresh consumption of organic herbs is used to make Himalaya product. Trusted brand by grandmothers for protection of baby skin any hygiene. Set of 9 products provide complete protection regarding bathing, cleaning or moisturising the skin. (FOR: 0–1-year child / QUANTITY: 9 Nos)
node.content: Himalaya, the known brand from India making baby care products since the Indian Independence and improving the baby hygiene and nourishment method from grass root level / Source of good nourishment agent like Winter Cherry, Almond Oil, Indian Lotus and Green gram are grown under the supervision of Himalaya at registered supplier field / Only mechanical process are used to extract the ingredients and every step of process include sterilization quality check / Baby wipes are made with natural fibres and no paper pulp is used just to avoid germs retention / This healthy bucket for new born babies contain 9 items, from diapers to baby wash and soap to baby lotion, complete skin care solution is provided / Recommended product by doctors and baby dietician for nourishment of skin.

node.name: Unisex Baby Wear MAKE: TODDYLON
node.description: High quality sleeveless cotton baby t-shirts & nappies, printed with natural ink and also soft to touch that won't irritate baby's delicate skin. Made with organic cotton which is effective against baby’s skin disease like Eczema. (FOR: 0-6 month child / QUANTITY: 6 T Shirt + 6 Nappy)
node.content: Made with Indian organic cotton which is healthy, breathable and did not retain any germs which causes infant or baby skin disease like Eczema / Quality cotton fabric stitch with the linen threads which does not scratch on the body / Printed with the natural ink that do not bleed under machine or hand wash and safe for babies skin against any infection / Stain proof cotton fabric is effective against the stain and easy to wash / Single layered nappies offer delicate skin care by maintaining excellent breathability, keeps baby fresh, relaxed and active throughout the day / Sleeveless t-shirt is one of the essential apparel for the babies born at summer and it is suitable for babies 0 to 6 months old / 6 number of t-shirt and 6 number of nappies make comfortable rotation and unisex design with waist strings can fit to any size of baby under 6 months.
node.alt: Toddylon Baby Boys and Baby Girls Soft Hosiery Cotton T Shirt and Nappy Multicolour 0 6 Months Combo Pack of 6

node.name: Elegant Baby Carrier MAKE: LUVLAP
node.description: With 4 carrying positions and polyester material one can feed the baby while maintaining the horizontal position through shoulder & waist belt. Design that emphasis on child safety and features which help mother to do work while carrying their baby. Comfortable nests that accompany baby on tours through the city streets and country roads. (FOR: 0-2 year / CARRY WEIGHT: 15 Kg / MATERIAL: Polyester)
node.content: Certified as per European standard but made in china, this carrier checklist all the requirements needed for safety as per holding the small babies / 4 carrying positions which create the holding angle from 0 to 90 degree / Material used is breathable polyester that means it will counter the sweat and heat accumulation / Easy to wash and can also fix to car seats without any other means to add / Adjustable wide padded shoulder straps with mesh fabric lining for the parent's comfort and convenience / Ergonomically designed to ensure the baby is always comfortably supported / One of the premium product for carrying the baby to take him outside.
node.alt: LuvLap Elegant Baby Carrier with 4 carry positions for 6 to 24 months baby Max weight Up to 15 Kgs Navy blue
